### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE compliance_policies_procedures (
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_name VARCHAR(255),
  policy_description TEXT,
  policy_owner VARCHAR(100),
  creation_date TIMESTAMP
)

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM compliance_policies_procedures WHERE policy_id = 1;
